product.name: Colorful Tequila Shot Glasses Set Of 4, Large Colored Shot Glasses, Hand Painted Small Glass Tequila Cups for Whiskey Espresso Vodka Liquors, Dishwasher Safe, Drinking Gift For Men and Women, 3oz
product.bullet_points:
• 4-Piece Shot Glass Set: Each pack comes with 4 artisan crafted shot glasses for men and women that offer just the right balance of charm and quality. They are easy to hold, feel comfortable in your hands, and can store up to 3oz so you can do shots in style
• Handmade With Care: Our multicolor shot glass set is handmade with close attention to even the smallest details using only mouth blown glass with a thick base which coupled with the vibrant and eye-catching design makes them ideal for impressing friends and family
• Sleek And Vibrant: Our shot glass cups offer exquisite clarity along with a colorful flower design that will function as a conversation piece at any party, wedding, bar, etc. for enjoying tequila, wine, martinis, vodka, cordials, espresso, liqueur, and any other shots
• Make It A Gift: Whether you’re looking for a gift for shot lovers, friends, or family, our shot glass gift box has you covered. Our colored shot glasses make the perfect gift for Housewarming, Birthdays, Christmas, New Year’s, Thanksgiving, Holidays, and more
• Easy To Clean And Maintain: The colorful shot glasses can easily be cleaned in the sink as well as being dishwasher safe to make cleanups quick and simple. We use bright and vibrant designs that are resistant to fading to provide long-term use
